nodes.text: Kraemr was a subscriber to, and commenter on, "Cynabar's Droid Datalog". In 2 BBY, Kraemr commented on the entry for the NR-5 Series Repair Droid, warning that a company called Tredwall was producing knock-off versions of the NR-5. In 0 ABY, Kraemr commented on the entry for the G-2RD series guard droid, relating a story where a G-2RD killed their previous partner while attempting to break an impound lock placed on their starship. Kraemr did three months in prison before managing to escape.
